title: üé® Draw & AI & Guesses
subtitle: DrawSomething AI Platform
hint: üí° It's recommended to read the guide if this is your first time

introduction.title: üé® Draw, AI Guesses
introduction.subtitle: DrawSomething AI Platform
introduction.description: A fun drawing challenge platform powered by AI vision recognition

what_is.title: What is "Draw, AI Guesses"?
what_is.p1: "Draw, AI Guesses" is an innovative drawing challenge platform that combines AI image recognition with fun game mechanics.
what_is.p2: Whether you are a beginner or an experienced artist, you can enjoy the platform and improve your skills through AI feedback.

level_draw.title: Drawing Levels
level_draw.desc: Progress from beginner to advanced with carefully designed keywords for each level.

free_draw.title: Free Draw
free_draw.desc: Create freely and let AI recognize your drawing based on any target word.

ai.title: AI Recognition
ai.desc: Advanced vision-language models accurately recognize and analyze drawings.

config.title: Custom Configuration
config.desc: Support configuring your own AI service such as Baidu AI Studio.

login.note: Not logging in will not affect gameplay:

bullets.can_use_ai: Can experience AI recognition if you've configured an AI service

extras.server_ai: Use server AI resources without configuration

login.tip: Tip: If you want to use the platform's AI services, please log in first. The system will allocate points for AI usage after login.

ai_setup.desc: You need to configure an AI service before first use:
ai_setup.tip: Tip: Without AI configuration the system won't use AI recognition.

step.select_level: Or click 'Select Level' to choose specific keywords
step.next_level: Automatically proceed to next level on success

step.submit: Submit and check AI recognition results

step.brush: Use the brush tool to draw on the canvas
step.erase: Use eraser or clear canvas if needed

view_result.desc: After submitting, AI will analyze your drawing and provide:

items.featured: Focus on key features and draw the most recognizable elements
items.clear_lines: Keep lines clear and avoid fuzzy doodles
items.add_detail: Add details appropriately for easier AI recognition
items.dont_give_up: Don't give up on failure; improve based on AI feedback

feedback.title: Found an issue? Got a suggestion?
feedback.description: Welcome to report bugs, propose improvements, or contribute on the GitHub project page!

aiConfigModal.title: AI Service Not Configured
aiConfigModal.detecting: We detected you have not configured AI services yet.

recommended.title: Recommended: Baidu PaddlePaddle AI Studio
recommended.bullet1: Free to use; register to obtain
recommended.bullet2: Supports vision recognition and image generation

aiConfigModal.get_access_token: register and obtain an Access Token

donate.title: Support Us
donate.subtitle: Your support helps us cover AI token usage costs

about.title: About service point usage
about.p1: Using service points under login will consume the developer's AI API quota.
about.p2: Currently, this feature is completely free with no usage limit.
about.p3: Your donations encourage the developer and help cover some API costs.
about.note: We plan to support purchasing quota to spare users from configuring models. For dev/testing environments this is impractical, therefore the feature is offered free for now ‚Äî enjoy!

recommend.note: AI API costs aren't expensive and align with our future paid plans

wechat.title: WeChat Donation QR Code
wechat.hint: Please place wechat-qr.jpg in the public folder

configAI.title: AI Configuration
configAI.subtitle: Configure connection parameters for vision model (Draw & AI Guesses) and text-to-image model (AI Draw)

placeholders.visionKey: Enter your Baidu AI Studio Access Token
placeholders.imageKey: Enter your Baidu AI Studio Access Token

messages.checkApiKey: Check if API Key is correct

messages.checkModelName: Confirm if model name is supported
messages.checkBackendRunning: Please check if backend service is running normally
messages.backendNotConnected: Cannot connect to backend service, please ensure backend service is started

messages.checkFirewall: Confirm firewall is not blocking connection

validation.enterImageUrl: Please enter text-to-image model API URL
validation.enterVisionKey: Please enter vision model API Key
validation.enterImageKey: Please enter text-to-image model API Key

preferences.serverTip: üí° Server endpoint requires login to use, prioritizes platform services, automatically switches to custom services when points are insufficient

footer.hint: üí° Hint: Configuration information will be saved in browser local storage, get API Key: visit
footer.help: üí° Vision model is used for "Draw & AI Guesses" game, text-to-image model is used for "AI Draw" game. When selecting server endpoint, platform services are prioritized, automatically fallback to custom services when points are insufficient. Please configure custom service parameters as backup.

gallery.empty: No artworks in the gallery yet, go draw and publish some!
